head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths JOHNSTON, ELIZABETH KNAPP

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths JOHNSTON, ELIZABETH KNAPP

block.p: JOHNSTON-Elizabeth Knapp, 97, of Camden, Maine and Scarsdale, NY on May 10, 2000, in Camden. Wife of the late George W. Knapp who died in 1957 and also the late William Johnston who died in 1988. Beloved mother of Virginia Knapp Leeper of Tarrytown, NY and of the late Barbara Knapp Millan; sister of Mary Cushing of Trumansville, NY; grandmother of Robert, Paul, James and Thomas Leeper; William and Jonathan Millan; and Sara Millan Wilson. Services and burial held May 13 in Camden, Maine.
